eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Validator's status changed. Event emitted for each executed trade.

functionDecorators.name: inCaseTokensGetStuck
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw unexpected tokens sent to the Simp Vault.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pause
functionDecorators.description: Triggers stopped state. Only possible when contract not paused.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Sets admin address to this address. Only callable by the contract owner. It makes the admin == owner.

functionDecorators.name: setCallFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets call fee. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: setPerformanceFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets performance fee. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: setTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Sets treasury address. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: setWithdrawFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets withdraw fee. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: setWithdrawFeePeriod
functionDecorators.description: Sets withdraw fee period. Only callable by the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unpause
functionDecorators.description: Returns to normal state. Only possible when contract is paused.
